segments.text: I'm studying the smaller details of the scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kitchen cabinets have simple doors with pulls, a very common design.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the stream of water flowing down their fronts from the sink overflow.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There are dishes stacked on the counter to the woman's right, next to the overflowing sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The dish towel she's using is bunched around the plate she's drying.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her complete absorption in this simple task is remarkable, given the chaos around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems utterly lost in the rhythm of her work.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It almost makes me wonder if she's daydreaming or just incredibly focused.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can a person be so insulated from their immediate surroundings?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This level of obliviousness is almost unbelievable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The calm, tidy garden outside the window stands in such stark contrast.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It emphasizes the peaceful routine, even as danger lurks within.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I find this situation genuinely perplexing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I simply can't fathom her lack of awareness.
segments.speaker: PAR
